text: Justin Patrick Herbert (born March 10, 1998) is an American football quarterback for the Los Angeles Chargers of the National Football League (NFL). He played college football at Oregon, where he won the 2019 Pac-12 Championship and was named MVP of the 2020 Rose Bowl. He was selected by the Chargers sixth overall in the 2020 NFL Draft. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Los Angeles Chargers players
title: Justin Herbert
